Exercicio_5a

a.) 110101(2) – 1011(2) 
110101(2)
-
001011(2)
---------
101010(2)

b.) 101,1001(2) – 3,1(8) 
3(8) = 011(2)
1(8) = 001(2)

101,1001(2)
-
011,0010(2)
-----------
(0)110,0111(2)

c.) 213(4) – 3D(16) 
213(4) = 100111(2)
3D(16) = 00111101(2)

00100111(2)
-
00111101(2)
-----------
-00010110(2)

d.) C5(16) – 1011001(2)          
C5(16) = 11000101(2)

11000101(2)
-
01011001(2)
-----------
01101100(2)

e.) 7E(10) – 2D(16) 
7E(10) = 111(2)
2D(16) = 00101101(2)

00000111(2)
-
00101101(2)
-----------
-00100110(2)
